data.title: Bellevue & Greater Seattle, Washington
data.meta_description:
Located only 10 miles from downtown Seattle, Bellevue offers the best of the Pacific Northwest with a more suburban and roomy feel. Downtown Bellevue offers urban benefits such as the Bellevue Arts Museum, Botanical Garden, many nearby parks and is considered the jewel of the Eastside. Additional Eastside communities like Kirkland, Redmond and Issaquah are only minutes away and offer affordable housing with highly rated public schools. The area has a strong public transportation system allowing for flexible commuting around Bellevue and into Seattle.

Amazon is growing in Bellevue! Check out our open positions below.
